asnapp.Title: Workout Video Recommendation System
asnapp.Description: For my senior capstone project, my group and I built a flask web application where users can create an account, login, choose between different recommendation options, and browse through personalized recommendations of workout videos.
asnapp.Skills/Tools: Python (flask, mysqlclient, selenium, beautifulsoup, pandas), AWS RDS, MySQL, Javascript, Bootstrap, HTML, CSS
asnapp.Categories: Full Stack Web Development, Recommender Systems, Webscraping

cupcake-muffin.Title: Cupcake/Muffin Classification
cupcake-muffin.Description: I webscraped cupcake and muffin recipes, analyzed their ingredient distributions, and ran various classification models to predict whether a recipe is a cupcake or muffin.

gbbo.Title: Great British Bake Off Data Visualization
gbbo.Description: I created a website to learn about the British television show, The Great British Bake Off, through a few data visualizations.

hp.Title: PostgreSQL Tutorial
hp.Description: As I am a Harry Potter fun, I wrote a PostgreSQL tutorial covering basic statements, joins, and subqueries on a Harry Potter themed database

lightfm.Title: Evaluation of LightFM's Recommendation Models
lightfm.Description: As part of my senior capstone sequence, my partner and I wrote an article on comparing LightFM's pure and hybrid collaborative filtering models with several well-tuned baselines in order to see if the model performance issues seen in research are also present with popular Python packages.

cape.Title: Analysis of Teaching Experience and Student Approval Ratings
cape.Description: For my econometrics honors course, I wrote a short paper on analyzing the relationship between a professor's teaching experience and their student approval ratings based on Course and Professor Evaluations data.

fordgobike.Title: EDA on Bike Share Data
fordgobike.Description: I conducted exploratory data analysis on the demographics, counts, durations, and locations of rides of Ford GoBike's bikeshare data.
